description: 2-enumeration of 2n X 2n half-turn symmetric alternating-sign matrices.
links: G. Kuperberg, Symmetry classes of alternating-sign matrices under one roof, arXiv math.CO/0008184 [Th. 3]
maple: A057170 := proc(n) local i, j, t1; t1 := 2^(n^2); for i to n do for j to n do if j-i mod 2 <> 0 then t1 := t1*(2*j - 2*i + 1)/(2*j - 2*i) end if end do end do; t1 end proc;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 04 2001
